data.otherText: Regrettably the new Stable Staff Lodge shall not be available for this two day meeting. We shall provide the same alternative facilities as provided for the Festival. In order to ensure Hotel accommodation is booked for your staff it is essential that you advise us of your requirements on: stablebookings@perth-races.co.uk. Please s send this information to us as early as possible. Harriet Graham 07843380401 or 01835840354
